A Component_part_3d_geometric_representation_relationship is a type of . A Component_part_3d_geometric_representation_relationship is the association between a or a and the that is the occurrence of the three-dimensional shape. If the type of the shape representation of the assembly is different from the type of the shape representation of the part, the Component_part_3d_geometric_representation_relationship allows a processor to create a shape rep of the assembly type and establish an equivalency relationship between that shape representation and the part shape representation. If the shape representation of the assembly is of the same type as the part shape representation, the Component_part_3d_geometric_representation_relationship shall reference the same shape representation as both the part_shape and the component_shape. That instance shall be a complex instance consisting of a combination of a part shape and of a component shape.
the component_shape specifies the role of the for the Component_part_3d_geometric_representation_relationship.
